name: 曾添文
objective: 介紹單位換算與有效數位，元素的原子結構、化學方程式平衡與計算，反應熱，氣體與氣體定律，大氣層與環境污染，週期表，化學鍵，化合物的分子結構，熱力學，動力學，反應機構，平衡常數，氧化與還原，酸鹼反應，電化學，混合物的分離及現代科技材料，奠定良好化學基礎。
schedule:
１.化學鍵:Chemical Bonding
２.溶液性質:  Properties of solutions, colligative properties of
electrolytic solutions
３.動力學:  Chemical kinetics, rate law, integrated rate law,
mechanism, catalysis
４.化學平衡: Chemical equilibrium,平衡常數, 應用, Chatelier’s
principle
５.酸鹼理論: Acids and bases, Lewis acids and bases
６.酸鹼平衡: Acid-base equilibria, acid-base indicators.
７.溶解度與錯合物平衡: Solubility, precipitation, equilibria
involving complex ions
８.熱力學: Spontaneity, entropy, free energy, free energy and work
９.電化學: Electrochemistry, voltaic cells, cell emf, batteries,
electrolysis
scorePolicy:
期中考:35%
平常小考:35%
期末考:30%
materials:
General Chemistry: Principles and Modern Applications
Petrucci; Herring; Madura; Bissonnette
Tenth Edition, Pearson Canada Inc.,2011.
